EmailTemplate.subject: A Better Way to Manage Your Virtualized Environment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What’s wasting your team’s time?
- Fighting fires and chasing down issues is time-consuming and takes away focus. - Complexity is increasing as you expand virtualization and adopt cloud services, not to mention the broad set of challenges around virtualization. - The optimal way to address this is to maintain your systems and applications in a healthy state.
A Better Approach
- VMTurbo offers a better way to automate control of your virtualized environment. - It’s being used by hundreds of organizations to drive down costs, improve virtual workload performance and maximize resource utilization. - Our Software-Defined Control system automates the decision-making process for your team and provides intelligent actions that maintain your virtual environment in a healthy state.
Learn More
- Download this free report <http://bit.ly/15CFjfs> from Forrester Research to learn why IT analytics, such as those offered by VMTurbo, can help you manage the challenges brought about by virtualization. - Check out this short overview <http://bit.ly/XYnaGJ> of VMTurbo’s approach to virtualization management
